display_long_description:
Lose yourself in **CONNECTOME**, a space of discovery and exploration. Simple gestures bring objects to life and grow a world around you in this room-based, interactive art and puzzle experience.

"Connect the dots takes on a whole new dimension of color, scale, and fluidity..." - UploadVR

"Wow. Beautiful. I love the minimalistic style." - @DilmerV

"This is truly unity. It makes me just... wonder." - @Matteo311

"This is so different from anything I have tried before & I love it!” - @Bliss2121

“My eyes burn from so much beauty. VR was made for this! - @sortiksystems

**“Connect the dots” to create objects…**
[media]



**“Pinch-to-reveal” hidden shapes and forms…**
[media]


**Get lost in a place of wonder and scale only possible in VR…**

[media]

**Core Features**:

- Hands-only gameplay—no controllers required (controllers not supported)
- 20 unique rooms at launch
- Gesture-based interactions designed to feel natural and intuitive
- Unique modes of interaction, including connect-the-dots and pinch-to-reveal
- Ambient soundtrack that enhances the visual environment

**Core Features**:

- Hands-only gameplay—no controllers required (controllers not supported)
- 20 unique rooms at launch
- Gesture-based interactions designed to feel natural and intuitive
- Unique modes of interaction, including connect-the-dots and pinch-to-reveal
- Ambient soundtrack that enhances the visual environment
